title: Britney Pregnant, Only Fans Killing, JLo Engaged and Billionaire Matchmaker
description:
JLo got a green stone for her sixth engagement and a second ring from Ben Affleck. Will Smith has been banned from the Oscars, and Jada said she did not need defending. Only Fans model stabbed her boyfriend dead. Was it murder or self-defense? Gina Hendrix is a matchmaker for the billionaires and the uber-wealthy. We go through the biggest dating mistakes and best ways to present yourself in real life and on your dating profiles. Where are the best places to go to meet the eligible wealthy men? We cover it all. Enjoy! 

Subscribe on Apple Podcasts to get exclusive Extra Juicy episodes every Friday and get all episodes of Juicy Scoop, ad-free

Or get access to Extra Juicy on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/juicyscoop
